quoteLast: , E.S.T.: Submarine fusion explosion destroys 40% of New York City. Analysis of fallout indicates U.S. Navy Polaris missiles were detonated underwater in bay; by elimination it is deduced that the submarine was the _Ethan Allen_.
title: Plague of Pythons
author: Pohl, Frederik, 1919-2013; Ritter, Bob [Illustrator]
